text:
Do you find yourself unsure where to start with your idea or how to maintain the discipline to work on it? Then join me in creating 'buildquest'

It's like a game and by completing it, you'll also have built your idea.

What do you think?

cc: @_buildspace  @_nightsweekends https://t.co/lDNXtwbgKk

user_info.name: Loukmane
user_info.description: I'm building a game with the goal to help you build your ideas - alterok - buildspace s5
